About

Hello, World!

This is the website for Truman State University’s ACM chapter. You can join our Discord channel. You don’t have to make an account, you can just look around. Hope to see you there.


You can also join us on our Facebook page

Please Don’t Mind the Dust

The website currently being used is brand new and has some touching up left to be done. Please feel free to report any weird bugs to acm@truman.edu
